game.name: Thalassophobia
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Thalassophobia is a 4-player co-op horror diving game set in the crushing darkness of the deep ocean. Descend beneath the surface, complete high-risk objectives, uncover long-forgotten secrets, and depend on your crew to survive the horrors waiting below. The deeper you go, the less safe you are.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Thalassophobia is a 4-player co-op horror diving game set in the crushing darkness of the deep ocean. Descend beneath the surface, complete high-risk objectives, uncover long-forgotten secrets, and depend on your crew to survive the horrors waiting below. The deeper you go, the less safe you are.
